item.title: Why I don’t read or watch mainstream media that much
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: Ever since I was a kid, I was never really the person who watches the mainstream television to watch news. Watching news on a television is a culture that a lot of people just grew up with as a “default.
